English: we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)
francais: nous (incluant la personne à qui l'on s'adresse)

q: 《`儒林外史~．`第~`三~`四~`回~》：「`近來~`咱們~`地方上~`響馬~`甚~`多~，`凡~`過往~`的~`客人~`須要~`遲行早住~。」

English: we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)
(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you
francais: nous (incluant la personne à qui l'on s'adresse)
